name: The Hunger Games: Mockingjay - Part 1: The Mockingjay Lives: The Making of MJ1
detailed_description: Dive into the world of The Hunger Games: Mockingjay - Part 1 with hours of behind-the-scenes interviews as the cast and crew give an in-depth look at the making of the penultimate film.
about_the_game: Dive into the world of The Hunger Games: Mockingjay - Part 1 with hours of behind-the-scenes interviews as the cast and crew give an in-depth look at the making of the penultimate film.
